DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study plan evaluate safety effectiveness common treatment algorithm use 500 Hz laser repetition rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Safety Effectiveness Study 500 Hz Technolas Perfect Vision Excimer Laser Asian Eyes Using LASIK
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical study plan evaluate safety effectiveness excimer laser treatment algorithms Proscan , Zyoptix Supracor 500 Hz laser system ametropia and/or presbyopia perform cornea virgin eye .
DOC.criteria: General Inclusion Criteria Subjects least 18 year age . Subjects able read , understand , sign statement Informed Consent . Subjects willing able return schedule followup examination 6 12 month respectively surgery . Corneal topography qualify High contrast , manifest , best spectaclecorrected distance visual acuity correctable binocular least 1.0 ( Snellen 20/20 6/6 ) monocular least 0.8 ( Snellen 20/25 6/7.5 ) . In case monocular surgery eye treat must best correct distance visual acuity least 0.8 ( Snellen 20/25 6/7.5 ) . Mesopic pupil size measure Zywave II WaveFront Aberrometer must < 7.0 mm photopic pupil size measure Orbscan II/ IIz must > 2.9 mm . Additional Inclusion Criteria Proscan Treatments For Proscan myopic subject require sphere 0.5 D 10.0 D cylinder 0.5 D 4.0 D ( corneal astigmatism ) SE 12.0 D For Proscan hyperopic subject require sphere +0.5 D +4.0 D cylinder +0.5 D +4.0 D ( corneal astigmatism ) SE +6.0 D. Additional Inclusion Criteria Zyoptix Treatments For Zyoptix myopic subject require sphere 0.5 D 10.0 D cylinder 0.5 D 4.0 D ( corneal astigmatism ) SE 12.0 D For Zyoptix hyperopic subject require sphere +0.5 D +4.0 D cylinder +0.5 D +4.0 D ( corneal astigmatism ) SE +6.0 D. For treatment Zyoptix algorithm , highorderaberration must least 0.35µm . Additional Inclusion Criteria Supracor Treatments For treatment SUPRACOR presbyopic algorithm , subject least 45 year old 85 year Myopic subject must 7.0 diopter ( D ) absolute spherical myopia ( spherical equivalent ) , 4.0 D refractive astigmatism ( NOT corneal astigmatism ) manifest subjective refraction . The spherical equivalent must 9.0 D. Hyperopic subject must +4 diopter ( D ) absolute spherical hyperopia ( spherical equivalent ) , +2.5 D refractive astigmatism ( NOT corneal astigmatism ) manifest subjective refraction eye . The spherical equivalent must +5.25 D. Subjects must presbyopia determine agerelated need optical aid ( > +1.50 D ) read best distance correction screen successfully acceptance SUPRACOR simulation . Exclusion Criteria Subjects combination baseline corneal thickness plan operative parameter LASIK procedure would result less 250 micron remain posterior corneal thickness flap postoperatively . Hyperopic eye baseline manifest subjective refraction exhibit difference great ± 0.75 D sphere power , difference great ± 0.50 D cylinder power , difference cylinder axis 15 degree compare baseline cycloplegic subjective refraction . For manifest cylinder less ±0.75 D , difference cylinder axis would take consideration . Subjects anterior segment pathology , include dry eye syndrome cataract , Investigator 's opinion would interfere best spectaclecorrected visual acuity successful treatment . Subjects evidence retinal vascular disease . Subjects residual , recurrent , active ocular disease , corneal abnormality Investigator 's opinion would interfere BSCVA successful treatment . Subjects sign keratoconus Subjects unstable central keratometry reading irregular mire . Subjects previous intraocular corneal surgery kind , include type Excimer laser surgery either refractive therapeutic purpose . Subjects history Herpes simplex Herpes zoster keratitis history glaucoma glaucoma suspect , corneal edema , increase IOP > 22mmHg risk angle closure . Subjects immunocompromised carry diagnosis connective tissue disease , clinically significant atopic disease , diabetes , autoimmune disease acute chronic illness increase risk subject confound outcome study . Subject take systemic medication likely affect wound heal corticosteroid antimetabolite . Subjects know pregnant , lactate , plan become pregnant course study . Subjects ocular muscle disorder include strabismus nystagmus , disorder affect fixation . Subjects cognitive impairment vulnerable person .
